overview:
Krish is a passionate technologist with a deep interest in entrepreneurship and a strong background in creating distributed client server applications, scalable software architecture design, business intelligence and drafting online marketing strategies.

He previously founded Athivision where he pioneered the development of many products in the area of mobile applications, remote desktop access/web meetings, internet security apps, data synchronization algorithms, remote support services, payment gateway systems and multimedia-streaming technologies. Three of his products had successful exits.

Krish holds a degree in Computer Engineering from Rutgers University and is an all-rounder with years of experience in product management, business development, marketing, technology development, operations, management of geographically distributed teams, web marketing, SEM, SEO services, and network infrastructure management.
